description: Number of primitive (period n) n-bead necklaces with exactly four different colored beads.
comments: Turning over the necklace is not allowed.
references: M. R. Nester (1999). Mathematical investigations of some plant interaction designs. PhD Thesis. University of Queensland, Brisbane, Australia.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: with(numtheory):b:= proc(n, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1,      add(mobius(n/d)*k^d, d=divisors(n))/n)    end:a:= n-> add(b(n, 4-j)*binomial(4, j)*(-1)^j, j=0..4):seq(a(n), n=1..30);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Jan 25 2015
author: Marks R. Nester (nesterm(AT)dpi.qld.gov.au)
